name: Corvux.me
desc: This website! This is a big testing ground as I learn more about various aspects of programming that I don't get to explore in my normal job. Corvux has been my username for years, so this domain made sense.

name: Steward
desc: Discord bot to help with play-by-post (pbp) game server moderation and automation. Uses rules and expressions to give more control to admins

name: Avrae Combat Planner
desc: GUI tool to help plan combat in Avrae and On the Fly Battlemaps (OTFBM)

name: Avrae Aliases
